title: How does Taylor Swift view love? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are many kinds of love. You love your friends as friends. You love your parents as parents. You love your work, I hope. You love good food or a good walk. And then there’s eternal love. One secret to Taylor, I’d say, is that she’s committed to eternal love, and that makes the other forms of love easier to do because her capacity for love runs that deep.
